sentences.en: A model may contain hundreds of artifacts, so we might need ways of grouping them or differentiating a few symbols from the others.
sentences.cn: 一个模型可能包含了数百个工件，这样我们可能需要将它们分组的方法，或者从其他的符号中进行一些区别。

sentences.en: Based on the principle of the differentiating interferometer, a novel optical fiber sound sensor was presented.
sentences.cn: 基于微分干涉仪原理, 建立了一套新型光纤声传感器系统.

sentences.en: Conclusion AECA might be helpful for differentiating SLE and ITP.
sentences.cn: 结论AECA的测定对鉴别ITP和SLE有显著的临床意义.

sentences.en: Conclusion Doppler echocardiogram is important in diagnosing and differentiating pulmonary stenosis.
sentences.cn: 结论多普勒超声在肺动脉瓣狭窄诊断与鉴别诊断中具有重要的价值.

sentences.en: Conclusion Galactography is an important method for diagnosing and differentiating mammoglandular diseases with nipple discharge.
sentences.cn: 结论乳导管造影对溢液性乳腺病诊断和鉴别诊断有重要价值.

sentences.en: Conclusions: NEVA is useful in differentiating psychological and vasculogenic ED.
sentences.cn: 结论: NE-VA 对临床上怀疑心理性ED和 血管性ED的诊断有较好的参考价值.

sentences.en: I infer that he is indifferents to differentiating the offers in different 788798 conferencez.
sentences.cn: 我推断他对区分不同会谈中的报价漠不关心.

sentences.en: In differentiating international from domestic trade, classical economists stressed the behavior of the factors of production.
sentences.cn: 在区别国际贸易与国内贸易时, 古典经济学家强调生产要素行为的特点.

sentences.en: It is proved that comparatively phase can get effect in differentiating fault classes of rotary mechanism.
sentences.cn: 研究结果表明,相对时相在旋转机械故障诊断中有较大的实用价值.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the elastography application in differentiating benign and malignant breast tumors.
sentences.cn: 目的评价组织弹性成像技术在鉴别诊断乳腺良、恶性肿块中的价值.

sentences.en: So it appears that banks do an unusually lousy job of differentiating themselves.
sentences.cn: 如此看来，银行业者通常在区分自己的工作上太过糟糕。

sentences.en: The image is the individual differentiating itself to ensure its own evolution.
sentences.cn: 意象是个人自我更新以保证自己进化不已.

sentences.en: The simplest and most effective method of differentiating areas is to use different colours.
sentences.cn: 区别面状要素最简单而又行之有效的办法,是使用不同的颜色.

sentences.en: They succeed in differentiating the most commodity - like products.
sentences.cn: 在最通用的日用产品方面,它们也能独树一帜标新立异.

sentences.en: Thus, differentiating between a tort and a crime is essential.
sentences.cn: 可见, 必须对侵权行为与犯罪行为加以区分.

sentences.en: Tretinoin, the first successful differentiating agent, approed by FDA for use in acute promyelocytic leukemia.
sentences.cn: FDA批准首个有效的促分化药物-维A酸治疗急性早幼粒细胞白血病.

sentences.en: What positive and negative differentiating behaviours have met in the company you work for?
sentences.cn: 在你所工作的企业中,你遇到了那些积极的和消极的差异化行为方式?

trans.tran_cn: 区分，区别，辨别( differentiate的现在分词 )，区别对待，表明…间的差别，构成…间差别的特征
